ygData.subject: Lv4 and lv5
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I thought it was at level 4 when you don t get the basic weapons and food and lv 5 when you start losing exp. Azboklin the enchanter ... Scott Murawski

>Shane its lvl 5 when you do.. its the same lvl when you no longer get food

and lv 5 when
you start losing exp.

Azboklin the enchanter
